title: Hegemonikón Application Case Studies
summary: This Knowledge Item documents the application of Hegemonikón's framework to FileMaker development, focusing on the MICKS Business System. Key patterns include the 'Anchor-Buoy Central Hub' (Star Schema) architecture, where all 6 layers (Company to Change Request) relate to centralized 'System' (Selection) and 'Search' (Criteria) controller tables. It formalizes 'Ladder Navigation' state reset rules, 'Structural Pruning', and 'Prefix-Coded UUIDs' for hierarchical test data. It also includes critical troubleshooting for Japanese character encoding (UTF-8 with BOM) on CSV imports and the 'Visual Ground-Truth Loop' (VGT-Loop) for precision execution.
